solution_line_template: Bea's sales amount to ${bea_price_dollars}/glass x {bea_num_glasses} glasses = {bea_sales_cents} cents.
Dawn's sales amount to ${dawn_price_dollars}/glass x {dawn_num_glasses} glasses = {dawn_sales_cents} cents.
So, Bea earned ${bea_sales_dollars} - ${dawn_sales_dollars} = {difference_cents} cents more than Dawn.
